attributes.action: Make Self balancing Scooters legal to use on public land.
attributes.additional_details: The CPS released a statement saying that self balancing scooters were illegal to use if not on private land due to section 72 of the Highway Code.
attributes.background: We would like self balancing scooters such as the "Swegway" legal to use on public land such as pavements And to have section 72 of the Highway Code changed to stop police being able to fine self balancing scooter riders.
